        Calculate the quality measures of the rules obtained by the algorithm

        Parameters:
        setRul - Set of final rules
        setTra - Set of train data
        setTst - Set of test data
        examClassTra - Number of examples for each class in the train data
        examClassTst - Number of examples for each class in the test data
        valueNameClass - Name for each class
        mea_file - Name of the measure file
